name: Spacewater
description:
Destroying robot sharkies and mantas with a spaceship in somewhere that's space, but underwater? I hope all of you enjoy my game! This is my first game on itch.io!

PC ONLY

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME:

1. Shooting: Aim with the mouse and left click like any other standard shooter

2. Movement: Aim with mouse use right mouse button to move to the mouse.

3. Power ups: There is a 20% chance that a hp power up spawns, and a 10% chance a shock wave grenade is spawned when killing an enemy. After 2 seconds it despawns.

4. Hp power up: increases your health by 1, if it's already at max don't bother it won't work(made it that way).

5. Shock wave grenade: If you picked up a shock wave grenade use it by pressing d.

6. Full screen: To make it full screen press space;

7. Mantas: gives 1 point, and gradually there will be more of them, and different versions of them at are harder. The higher the score the harder it is.

8. Sharkies: gives 3 points, and gradually there will be more of them, and different versions of them at are harder. The higher the score the harder it is.

Thanks for reading and downloading! If you want something else to the game write it down in the community section below! Another thing if you want to see more of my games that are coming soon you should follow me on itch.io!
